name: Bean Attack (PeacekeeperLife)
description:
"Oh no, The beans are invading! Quickly, hop in your ship and try to attain the highest possible score that you can. Good luck pilot, we believe in you."

--

A small, albeit action packed arcade game featuring 5 unique enemy types and a game mode that will go on forever!

--

Music:

The main menu music was created by Eggy Toast.

The in game tracks are named: Stage 1, Stage 2, and Towel Defence Ingame.

They were created by sawsquarenoise.

--

Note: There is a small bug where the background will occasionally bug out, I never noticed this during play testing, but it exists.
